title: NIT Calicut Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for Junior Translation Officer Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Calicut (NIT Calicut) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Translation Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, Post-graduation can apply for the NIT Calicut Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
